title: Best quotes
posts: The strong man is not the good wrestler; the strong man is only the one who controls himself when he is angry.
It was a Person that God gave, it is a Person that we need, and it is a Person that we accept by faith.
The best-humour'd man, with the worst-humour'd Muse.
Those are my principles. If you don't like them I have others.
Boast is always a cry of despair, except in the young it is a cry of hope.
